page.title: 16HOUSES IN OUR AREA-R.TILFORD
page.content: THE DETACHED IS THE MOST COMMON HOUSE IN OUR AREA CLOSELY FOLLOWED BY THE SEMI-DETACHED THEN THE BUNGALOW THEN THE TERRACED. { THE DETACHED}STANDS ON ITS OWN WITHOUT TOUCHING ANY OTHER HOUSES. { SEMI-DETACHED}IS A HOUSE WHICH IS TOUCHING ANOTHER HOUSE. { BUNGALOW}IS A HOUSE WITH NO UPSTAIRS. { TERRACED}A ROW OF HOUSES WITH MORE THAN TWO IN IT { A TYPICAL HOUSE}WOULD HAVE A FRONT AND BACK GARDEN WITH A LOUNGE OR LIVING ROOM,WITH A KITCHEN AND DOWNSTAIRS TOILET.THEN THERE WOULD BE THREE MEDIUM SIZED BEDROOMS,PERHAPS ONE SPARE ROOM.IT WOULD PERHAPS HAVE A PORCH AND A GARAGE AND A LOFT.
